actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain color television receiver entries to correct an error that was made in connection with the original liquidation.

summary.text: Provides for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain color television receiver entries in accordance with the final results of the administrative reviews, covering specified periods, undertaken by the International Trade Administration of the Department of Commerce for such entries.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain color television receiver entries to correct an error that was made in connection with the original liquidation.
